alert.note: Alert for Adams; Franklin; Harlan; Kearney; Nuckolls; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 8:02PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT MITCHELL...WESTERN JEWELL... SMITH...OSBORNE...NORTHEASTERN PHILLIPS...WEST CENTRAL NUCKOLLS... FRANKLIN...WEBSTER...SOUTHWESTERN ADAMS...SOUTHEASTERN KEARNEY AND EAST CENTRAL HARLAN COUNTIES THROUGH 845 PM CDT... At 802 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Upland to near Inavale to 9 miles northeast of Portis to 7 miles north of Lucas. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Beloit, Smith Center, Osborne, Red Cloud, Franklin, Blue Hill, Downs, Mankato, Cawker City, Glen Elder, Jewell, Campbell, Bladen, Guide Rock, Lebanon, Tipton, Burr Oak, Upland, Gaylord, and Naponee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with some of these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Franklin; Harlan; Kearney; Nuckolls; Webster
